mean_en: a device for viewing through a magnifying lens a sequence of pictures on an endless band of film moved continuously over a light source and a rapidly rotating shutter that creates an illusion of motion
sentence: At the museum they had a very old kinetoscope.
sentence_trans: 博物馆有一个非常老旧的活动电影放映机。
word_etyma: kine显像管 ＋ to到 ＋ scope眼界 → 通过显像管作用开阔眼界 → kinetoscope活动电影放映机
